definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
monocotyledon (plant family distinguished by single embryonic leaf, includes grasses, orchids and lilies)
dicotyledon (plant family distinguished by two embryonic leaves, includes daisies, broadleaved trees, herbaceous plants)

sentences.english: Effects of calcium on chilling resistance of radish cotyledons were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了鈣對蘿蔔子葉抗寒性的影響。

sentences.english: The regenerated plantlets were obtained from the cotyledons after shoot and root inducing cultivations.
sentences.chinese: 子葉經發芽及生根誘導培養後得到了再生植株。

sentences.english: The reticulate pattern of minor veins is characteristic of most dicotyledonous plants.
sentences.chinese: 細脈的網狀式樣是雙子葉植物的主要特徵。

sentences.english: The seed leaves contain stored-up food.
sentences.chinese: 子葉裏含有儲存起來的養料。

sentences.english: Ginseng is a perennial dicotyledonous herbs Nightshade classes.
sentences.chinese: 人蔘果屬茄科類多年生雙子葉草本植物。

sentences.english: The dicotyledons diverged at an early stage of their evolution into two main groups.
sentences.chinese: 雙子葉植物在演化的早期階段就已分化爲兩大支派。

sentences.english: Fibrous root systems are characteristic of monocotyledons .
sentences.chinese: 鬚根系是單子葉植物的特徵。

sentences.english: In general the monocotyledon is more difficult than dicotyledon in tissue culture.
sentences.chinese: 通常單子葉植物的組織培養與再生比雙子葉植物困難。

sentences.english: In general the monocotyledon is more difficult than dicotyledon in tissue culture.
sentences.chinese: 通常單子葉植物的組織培養與再生比雙子葉植物困難。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effect of leaves of Elaeagnus bockii Diels on immune-functions of mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胡頹子葉對小鼠免疫功能的影響。

sentences.english: ATP ase activity was mainly deposited in the plasma membrane.
sentences.chinese: 子葉細胞的ATP酶活性主要定位在質膜。

sentences.english: Quantities of polysaccharide vesicles are transported in bulk through vascular bundles.
sentences.chinese: 含多糖的球形顆粒通過維管束在子葉中運輸。

sentences.english: Whether the variations in cotyledons are caused by physiological or genetic factors must await more research.
sentences.chinese: 子葉的變異是遺傳原因還是生理影響尚需進一步研究。

sentences.english: The pattern of the secondary growth of the soybean root is similar to that of most dicots.
sentences.chinese: 大豆根次生生長的類型和多數雙子葉植物相似。

sentences.english: The esterase isoenzyme bands were the most in cotyledon differentiatingembryoid, but the least in mature embryoid.
sentences.chinese: 酯酶同工酶則以子葉分化期胚爲最多，成熟胚爲最少。

sentences.english: Source: The dicotyledonous plants for the cruciferous plants Ximing the whole plant.
sentences.chinese: 爲雙子葉植物藥十字花科植物菥蓂的全草。
